newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks seen weak on correction.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks seen weak on correction.

text.p: Pakistani stocks are likely to remain weak on Friday on a correction as the market is still overbought, dealers said, adding that sentiment would be from mixed to down in the near term.

"The index is likely to open up today, but would fall towards the close as most players are still in an overbought position," dealer Sajjad Mankani said. "There is no market moving news in sight, at least for the time being."
On Wednesday, the index fell 31.54 points, or 1.63 percent, to 1,898.27. Losers led gainers 157 to 59.
Turnover fell to 60.09 million shares from 84.49 million in the previous session.
